mechanics.trigger: Creature affected by Water Walk attempts to move on liquid surface
mechanics.condition: Liquid surface is one of: water, acid, mud, snow, quicksand, or lava
mechanics.outcome: Creature can move across the liquid as if it were harmless solid ground

mechanics.trigger: Creature affected by Water Walk is crossing molten lava
mechanics.outcome: Creature can still take damage from the heat of the lava

mechanics.trigger: Water Walk spell is cast targeting a creature submerged in liquid
mechanics.condition: Target creature is submerged in liquid
mechanics.outcome: Target is carried to the surface of the liquid at a rate of 60 feet per round

description_text: This spell grants the ability to move across any liquid surface--such as water, acid, mud, snow, quicksand, or lava--as if it were harmless solid ground (creatures crossing molten lava can still take damage from the heat). Up to ten willing creatures you can see within range gain this ability for the duration.If you target a creature submerged in a liquid, the spell carries the target to the surface of the liquid at a rate of 60 feet per round.
